EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.NYC_Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Analytics Innovation Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Analytics Innovation Roadshow taking place tomorrow in New York. For those attending the Data Science Workshop, please remember to bring your own laptop.
Date: Wednesday, June 14th
Time:
8:00am - 9:00am Breakfast 9:00am - 12:15pm Sessions 12:15pm - 1:15pm Lunch 1:15pm - 5:30pm Data Science Workshop
Location:
Galvanize NYC 315 Hudson St New York, NY 10013 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Galvanize/@40.7263915,-74.0099859,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89c259f320f7d26b:0x3af58266e45afbae!8m2!3d40.7263875!4d-74.0077919]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/newyork?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
PARKING Public transportation is recommended. There are two nearby parking garages at the below addresses:
- 575 Washington St. New York, NY 10014 - 293 Hudson St. New York, NY 10013
If you have any questions, feel free to email Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>. We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
